summary: I’m a dedicated and responsible clinical pharmacist and researcher. I’m very interested in innovative pharmaceutical care. Next to that, I’m a caring person and strive for high quality care.

projects.title: 59th World Congress of the International Pharmaceutical Students' Federation
projects.description: Organising the 59th IPSF World Congress. The 59th World Congress has taken place in the city of Utrecht during the Summer of 2013. IPSF represents around 350,000 pharmacy students in over 65 countries worldwide. Approximately 550 students attended this 10 days congress.

profile_positions.description: Clinical pharmacist at Enköpings Husläkarcentrum and Fjärdhundra Vårdcentral (primary care centres). volunteer_experiences.description:
The goal of this foundation is to stimulate young pharmacists to innovate pharmaceutical care. Our first activity is the organisation of a masterclass "Innovation in pharmaceutical care" in March 2015.
www.careforpharmacy.nl
